intent: Added Claude and Cursor logos to their respective integration sections
reasoning_trace:
Added visual branding for Claude Code and Cursor integration sections to make them more recognizable and professional.

Changes:
1. README.md - Added img tags with height=40 for both logos:
   - Claude logo (claude_logo.svg.png) above Claude Code Integration heading
   - Cursor logo (cursor_logo.png) above Cursor Integration heading

2. docs/index.html - Added centered logo images with Tailwind classes:
   - Claude logo with h-12 class in a flex container above the section title
   - Cursor logo with same styling above Cursor Integration section
   - Logos are copied to docs/ folder for proper relative paths

The logos help users quickly identify which AI tool each section applies to, improving scannability of the documentation.

rejected_alternatives.name: Placing logos inline with headings (looked cluttered)
Using smaller logo sizes (hard to see)
Adding logos to nav bar (too busy, these are integrations not primary features)
